hero.title: Your Card Program. Zero Interchange Fees.
hero.subtitle: Launch your own white-label payment card. A complete platform for banks, financial institutions, and merchants who want to innovate without the traditional costs.

features.title: A Revolutionary Payment Platform
features.subtitle: Designed to optimize your revenue and build customer loyalty.
features.feature1_desc: Eliminate a major cost source and increase your margins on every transaction with our private payment processor.
features.feature2_desc: Strengthen your brand with custom debit, credit, or prepaid cards bearing your logo, with no initial development fees.
features.feature3_desc: Offer credit, debit, and prepaid products on a single card, allowing you to create unique offers for your customers.
features.feature4_desc: Benefit from simple integration and expert support based in Quebec to launch your card program quickly.

testimonials.title: What Our Partners Are Saying
testimonials.testimonial1_quote: Integrating the Inglis Dominion solution allowed us to launch an innovative credit card in record time, while significantly reducing our operational costs.
testimonials.testimonial2_quote: The white-label prepaid card program has transformed our loyalty program. It's a powerful marketing tool and a new source of revenue for us.

cta.title: Ready to launch your own payment solution?
cta.subtitle: Contact our team of experts to discover how Inglis Dominion can transform your business.
